data.title: Pavilions - Memphis, TN
data.meta_description: Find the perfect experience for you! With 4,500 acres of green space, Shelby Farms Park has something for everyone!
data.text:
CELEBRATE IN THE GREAT OUTDOORS

Shelby Farms Park is the perfect spot for your company, group or family get-together! Multiple pavilions and picnic areas are located throughout the Park.

To search by date or space or to request a reservation, click the BOOK NOW button

General Pavilion Information:

Pavilion Pricing

Download Pavilion/Picnic Area Map

General Park Rules

Info on All Pavilions

Large Pavilions

Hyde Lake Pavilion | Capacity: Approximately 90

Located on Hyde Lake in Heart of the Park

Features: Handicap accessible, 12 picnic tables, one double grill, 24’ serving counter, large trash can, non-potable water supply, electricity, scenic view of Hyde Lake, close walk to First Horizon Foundation Visitor Center, indoor restrooms, Lake's Edge Gift Shop, Hyde Lake Boat House, Hyde Lake Wheel House, nearby parking

#1 - Tour de Wolf |Capacity: Approximately 100

Located across from the Woodland Discovery Playground

Features: Electricity, 15 picnic tables, a large grill, shaded by trees, short walk to Woodland Discovery Playground restrooms

#3 - Stables Pavilion |Capacity: Approximately 100

Located across from Shelby Farms Stables

Features: Electricity, 15 picnic tables, a large grill, volleyball posts, porta potty, close to stables

Medium Pavilions

#7 - Chickasaw Pavilion | Capacity: Approximately 50

Located in the loop off of Pine Lake Drive

Features: Six picnic tables, a double grill, overlooks disc golf course, short walk to Chickasaw Lake, porta potty nearby

Jones Pond Pavilion | Capacity: Approximately 75

Located in Heart of the Park

Features: Handicap accessible, nine picnic tables, a double grill, 24’ serving counter, large trash can, non-potable water supply, electricity, close walk to First Horizon Foundation Visitor Center, indoor restrooms, Lake's Edge Gift Shop, , Hyde Lake Boat House, Hyde Lake Wheel House, nearby parking

Small Pavilions

#2 - Pine Lake Pavilion | Capacity: Approximately 30

Located close to Woodland Discovery Playground

Four picnic tables, a grill, close to Woodland Discovery Playground, playground restrooms, Pine Lake boat rentals, fishing pier, and Go Ape Treetop Adventure Course

#4 - Beaver Lake Pavilion | Capacity: Approximately 30

Located at Beaver Lake

Features: Four picnic tables, a grill, volleyball posts, spectacular view of Beaver Lake, near horse stables, plenty of open space, near port-a-potty
